title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 413.4 - Application procedures for mortgage brokers to obtain the approval of the superintendent to make fha insured mortgage loans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 413.4 - Application procedures for mortgage brokers to obtain the approval of the superintendent to make fha insured mortgage loans

State Regulations

Such application procedures are set forth in Banking

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
